propSpec.name: vertical
propSpec.desc: When true, the slider will be vertically positioned

propSpec.name: min
propSpec.desc: A number defining the minimum value for the slider

propSpec.name: max
propSpec.desc: A number defining the maximum value for the slider

propSpec.name: value
propSpec.desc: The current value of the slider

propSpec.name: hasLabel
propSpec.desc: When true, the slider will have a label

propSpec.name: handlerOnChange
propSpec.desc: A handler function to be executed on value change

propSpec.name: isDiscrete
propSpec.desc: When true, the slider will render with discrete values

propSpec.name: interval
propSpec.desc: A number defining the value to be added or subtracted on each step the slider makes

propSpec.name: hasTooltip
propSpec.desc: When true, a tooltip will be shown when dragging the handle

propSpec.name: tooltipPosition
propSpec.desc: A string that defines the position of the tooltip

propSpec.name: colorRail
propSpec.desc: A string that defines the color of the slider rail

propSpec.name: colorHandle
propSpec.desc: A string that defines the color of the slider handle

propSpec.name: colorTrack
propSpec.desc: A string that defines the color of the slider track
